title: PROJECT skin thoughts
body: With the new PROJECT skins (http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-project/#!core) I was wondering what they might be.Here are my thoughts. The "Shadow Marked" one is obviously Zed. I thought the "Ethereal Flames" one was Kayle because of the protector line although I'm not sure since it says she stands alone and Kayle is with Demacia, although I can't say it's Leona since she also trys to protect others (not alone, shes with who she protects)  and the "Weaves,unweaves" one Shen because of the blade dancing and the one vision ( his ult is Stand United). I'm unsure about the "Piercing Flame" and the unknown one.

replies.body: No there are actually 6 of them unknown one is yasuos brother . I'll confirm here dat project Lucian is the one for piercing flame.
Why I don't want it to be true this guy has a pretty good theory http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/2400/9426/original.jpg
Tbh, I think I agree with all of them except fiora, just because Irelia sounds a bit more blade dancee, if you know what I mean...

It says unraveled defense which looks like it points to the strategy of hitting vulnerable points (unravelling a weakness) and it also says caught orbiting one vision which sounds like the 4 points of her ultimate as she has to run around them to complete her "Grand challenge" (One vision).
Yeah but fioras ult is duelist dance so yeaahh
The champions that are receiving the new skins are: Fiora, Master Yi, Zed, Lucian and finally Leona
Shadow one is zed for sure, I think the dashing blade dancing one is Irelia, not Shen! Can't figure out other two though

> Shadow one is zed for sure, I think the dashing blade dancing one is Irelia, not Shen! Can't figure out other two though


 That makes sense, I thought about it before I posted the post but I couldn't see PROJECT : Irelia as a skin. But Riot did it to Yasuo so maybe.
